Class ImageController

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner.controllers.ImageController
public class ImageController extends Object
Controller class for handling image-related features in the application. This includes loading images into ImageViews, handling logos, and managing poster images for movies. Integrates with the TMDb API for image resources. Dependencies include TMDbUtility and MovieDataController.
Author:
kian, Make

  • Method Details

    • loadImageIntoView

      public void loadImageIntoView(String imagePath, String fxId, Integer width, javafx.scene.Scene scene)
      This method takes the image path from TMDb API and sets the image in the specified ImageView. If width is not provided, it loads the original size.
      Parameters:
      imagePath - The image path provided by the TMDb API (e.g., "/8nytsqL59SFJTVYVrN72k6qkGgJ.jpg")
      fxId - The fx:id of the ImageView where the image should be loaded.
      width - The desired width for the image (if null, it will use the "original" size).
      scene - The current scene where the ImageView is located.

    • loadImageIntoView

      public void loadImageIntoView(String imagePath, String fxId, javafx.scene.Scene scene)
      Overloaded method to load image without specifying width, defaults to original size.
      Parameters:
      imagePath - The image path provided by the TMDb API.
      fxId - The fx:id of the ImageView where the image should be loaded.
      scene - The current scene where the ImageView is located.

    • loadLogosIntoMovieLabel

      public void loadLogosIntoMovieLabel(String imagePath, javafx.scene.layout.TilePane logoContainer)
      This method takes the logo path from TMDb API and sets the logo in the specified logo container.
      Parameters:
      imagePath - The image path provided by the TMDb API (e.g., "/8nytsqL59SFJTVYVrN72k6qkGgJ.jpg")
      logoContainer - The TilePane where the logo image will be added.

    • loadPosterIntoMovieLabel

      public void loadPosterIntoMovieLabel(String imagePath, javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, Integer height)
      Loads a poster image from the TMDb API into the specified ImageView. The poster image is resized to a specified height while maintaining its aspect ratio.
      Parameters:
      imagePath - The image path from the TMDb API (e.g., "/poster.jpg").
      imageView - The ImageView where the poster image will be displayed.
      height - The desired height for the poster image.

    • loadProviderLogos

      public javafx.scene.control.CheckBox loadProviderLogos(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, MovieDataController mdc)
      Loads a streaming provider logo into an ImageView and applies a rounded clip to the image. The method also returns the associated CheckBox for the provider.
      Parameters:
      imageView - The ImageView where the provider logo will be displayed.
      mdc - The MovieDataController providing the streaming provider data.
      Returns:
      The CheckBox associated with the streaming provider.
